body:
Perhaps we need update tests in [Scripting.Classes.BasicParsing.Tests.ps1](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/6718/files/7caf6b955697b3b1fcb796d9251721d93a032ef8#diff-62b80b876d9b651ad0075f6d6829c428)

From @SteveL-MSFT [comment](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/6718#discussion_r184255596)
> Perhaps we can update this test similar to what we have in the Format-Table.tests.ps1 which is instead of these 3 checks, we can have:

```powershell
# hiddenZ should not show up in table
$expectedTable = @"

visibleX visibleY
-------- --------
      10       12



"@

$tableOutput = $instance | Format-Table -AutoSize | Out-String
$tableOutput | Should -BeExactly $expectedTable
```
title: Update tests in Scripting.Classes.BasicParsing.Tests.ps1
